urlDesc.nom: Dans les modes de transport en commun

Query.select: SELECT r.id_rubrique id, r.titre, r.id_parent parent
Query.from: FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_mots_rubriques mr ON mr.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique AND mr.id_mot IN (54,56,57,58,59,60,138,139,146)
FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_mots_rubriques mr ON mr.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique
FROM spip_articles a INNER JOIN spip_mots_articles ma ON mr.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique

Query.select: SELECT a.id_article idArt, a.titre titreArt, a.date aDate , r.id_rubrique idRub, r.titre titreRub , rp.id_rubrique idRubPar, rp.titre titreRubPar , fd.id_donnee idDon , fdc.valeur idCont , fdc1.valeur idPbPlan , fdc2.valeur photo , fdc3.valeur obs , fdcc1.valeur TextCont , m.titre RepCont , m1.titre ReponsePhoto , fdc21.valeur regle , fdp2.id_donnee idDonneCont
Query.from:
FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =60 INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc ON fdc.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc.champ = 'ligne_3' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc1 ON fdc1.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc1.champ = 'ligne_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc3 ON fdc3.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc3.champ = 'texte_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc2 ON fdc2.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc2.champ = 'mot_1' LEFT JOIN spip_mots m1 ON m1.id_mot = fdc2.valeur
INNER JOIN spip_rubriques rp ON rp.id_rubrique = r.id_parent
INNER JOIN spip_articles a1 ON a1.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda1 ON fda1.id_article = a1.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdp ON fdp.id_donnee = fda1.id_donnee AND fdp.id_form =59 INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc ON fdcc.id_donnee = fdp.id_donnee AND fdcc.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcc.valeur = fdc.valeur INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc1 ON fdcc1.id_donnee = fdcc.id_donnee AND fdcc1.champ = 'ligne_2' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc2 ON fdcc2.id_donnee = fdcc.id_donnee AND fdcc2.champ = 'mot_1' INNER JOIN spip_mots m ON m.id_mot = fdcc2.valeur
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdp2 ON fdp2.id_form =-idFormCont- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc22 ON fdc22.id_donnee = fdp2.id_donnee AND fdc22.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdc22.valeur = fdc.valeur LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc21 ON fdc21.id_donnee = fdp2.id_donnee AND fdc21.champ = 'multiple_1' AND fdc21.valeur = 'multiple_1_1'
Query.where: WHERE r.id_rubrique IN(-ids-) GROUP BY idRubPar, idRub, IdArt ORDER BY idRubPar, idRub, IdArt, idCont

Query.select: SELECT a.id_article idArt, a.titre titreArt, a.date aDate , r.id_rubrique idRub, r.titre titreRub , rp.id_rubrique idRubPar, rp.titre titreRubPar , fd.id_donnee idDon , fdc.valeur idCont , fdc1.valeur obs , fdc2.valeur idPbPlan , fdcc1.valeur TextCont , m.titre RepCont , m1.titre ReponsePhoto , fdc21.valeur regle , fdc21.id_donnee idDonneCont
Query.from:
FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =67 INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc ON fdc.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc.champ = 'ligne_5' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc1 ON fdc1.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc1.champ = 'ligne_3' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc2 ON fdc2.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc2.champ = 'ligne_2' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc3 ON fdc3.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc3.champ = 'mot_1' LEFT JOIN spip_mots m1 ON m1.id_mot = fdc3.valeur
INNER JOIN spip_rubriques rp ON rp.id_rubrique = r.id_parent
INNER JOIN spip_articles a1 ON a1.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda1 ON fda1.id_article = a1.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdp ON fdp.id_donnee = fda1.id_donnee AND fdp.id_form =-idFormRep- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc ON fdcc.id_donnee = fdp.id_donnee AND fdcc.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcc.valeur = fdc.valeur INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc1 ON fdcc1.id_donnee = fdcc.id_donnee AND fdcc1.champ = 'ligne_2' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc2 ON fdcc2.id_donnee = fdcc.id_donnee AND fdcc2.champ = 'mot_1' INNER JOIN spip_mots m ON m.id_mot = fdcc2.valeur
INNER JOIN spip_articles a2 ON a2.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda2 ON fda2.id_article = a2.id_article LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdp2 ON fdp2.id_donnee = fda2.id_donnee AND fdp2.id_form =-idFormCont- LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc21 ON fdc21.id_donnee = fdp2.id_donnee AND fdc21.champ = 'multiple_1' AND fdc21.valeur = 'multiple_1_1'
Query.where: WHERE r.id_rubrique IN(-ids-) GROUP BY idRubPar, idRub, IdArt ORDER BY idRubPar, idRub, IdArt, idCont

Query.select: SELECT COUNT(fdcMoteur.valeur) moteur , COUNT(fdcAudio.valeur) audio , COUNT(fdcVisu.valeur) visu , COUNT(fdcCog.valeur) cog
Query.from:
FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =-idFormRep- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRef ON fdcRef.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRef.champ = 'ligne_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRep ON fdcRep.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRep.champ = 'mot_1' INNER JOIN spip_mots m ON m.id_mot = fdcRep.valeur AND m.titre='Oui'
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdCont ON fdCont.id_form =-idFormCont- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcCont ON fdcCont.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcCont.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcCont.valeur = fdcRef.valeur LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcMoteur ON fdcMoteur.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcMoteur.champ = 'multiple_3' AND fdcMoteur.valeur = 'multiple_3_1' LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcAudio ON fdcAudio.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcAudio.champ = 'multiple_3' AND fdcAudio.valeur = 'multiple_3_2' LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcVisu ON fdcVisu.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcVisu.champ = 'multiple_3' AND fdcVisu.valeur = 'multiple_3_3' LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcCog ON fdcCog.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcCog.champ = 'multiple_3' AND fdcCog.valeur = 'multiple_3_4'

Query.select: SELECT COUNT(fdcM.valeur) moteur , COUNT(fdcA.valeur) audio , COUNT(fdcV.valeur) visu , COUNT(fdcC.valeur) cog
Query.from:
FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =-idFormRep- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRef ON fdcRef.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRef.champ = 'ligne_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRep ON fdcRep.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRep.champ = 'mot_1' INNER JOIN spip_mots m ON m.id_mot = fdcRep.valeur AND m.titre='Non'
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdCont ON fdCont.id_form =-idFormCont- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcCont ON fdcCont.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcCont.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcCont.valeur = fdcRef.valeur
LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcM ON fdcM.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcM.champ = 'ligne_2' AND fdcM.valeur = -handi-
LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcA ON fdcA.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcA.champ = 'ligne_3' AND fdcA.valeur = -handi-
LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcV ON fdcV.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcV.champ = 'ligne_4' AND fdcV.valeur = -handi-
LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcC ON fdcC.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcC.champ = 'ligne_5' AND fdcC.valeur = -handi-

FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =-idFormRep- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRef ON fdcRef.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRef.champ = 'ligne_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRep ON fdcRep.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRep.champ = 'mot_1' INNER JOIN spip_mots m ON m.id_mot = fdcRep.valeur AND m.titre='Oui'
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdCont ON fdCont.id_form =-idFormCont- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcCont ON fdcCont.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcCont.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcCont.valeur = fdcRef.valeur INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcM ON fdcM.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcM.champ = '-champ-' AND fdcM.valeur = '-valeur-' LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcAff ON fdcAff.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcAff.champ = 'texte_2'

FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =-idFormRep- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRef ON fdcRef.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRef.champ = 'ligne_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcRep ON fdcRep.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdcRep.champ = 'mot_1' INNER JOIN spip_mots m ON m.id_mot = fdcRep.valeur AND m.titre='Non'
INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdCont ON fdCont.id_form =-idFormCont- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcCont ON fdcCont.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcCont.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcCont.valeur = fdcRef.valeur INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcM ON fdcM.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcM.champ = '-champ-' AND fdcM.valeur = -valeur- LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcAff ON fdcAff.id_donnee = fdCont.id_donnee AND fdcAff.champ = 'texte_1'

FROM spip_rubriques r INNER JOIN spip_articles a ON a.id_rubrique = r.id_rubrique INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form =60 INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc ON fdc.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc.champ = 'ligne_3' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc ON fdcc.champ = 'ligne_1' AND fdcc.valeur = fdc.valeur INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdcc3 ON fdcc.id_donnee = fdcc.id_donnee AND fdcc.champ = 'multiple_3' INNER JOIN spip_forms_champs_choix fcc ON fcc.choix = fdcc.valeur AND fcc3.id_form =54
Query.where: WHERE r.id_rubrique IN(-ids-) ORDER BY idRubPar, idRub, IdArt GROUP BY TypeCrit

Query.select: SELECT f.id_form id, f.titre, fda.id_article idArt
Query.from: FROM spip_forms f INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_form = f.id_form INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee

FROM spip_forms_donnees fd INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fdaV ON fdaV.id_article = fda.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fdV ON fdV.id_donnee = fdaV.id_donnee AND fdV.id_form = -idGrille-

FROM spip_forms_donnees fd INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fda.id_article = -idArt- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc ON fdc.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc.champ = "-champ-" AND fdc.valeur = "-valeur-"
FROM spip_articles
FROM spip_forms_donnees_articles da INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = da.id_donnee

Query.select: SELECT dc.valeur, dc.champ, dc.id_donnee, fc.id_form grille, fc.titre, fc.type, fc.extra_info
Query.from: FROM spip_forms_donnees_champs dc INNER JOIN spip_forms_champs fc ON fc.champ = dc.champ
Query.where: WHERE dc.id_donnee =-id- AND fc.id_form =-idGrille- ORDER BY dc.id_donnee, fc.rang, dc.champ

Query.select: SELECT fda.id_article, dc.valeur, dc.champ, dc.id_donnee, fc.id_form grille, fc.titre, fc.type, fc.extra_info
Query.from: FROM spip_forms_donnees_champs dc INNER JOIN spip_forms_champs fc ON fc.champ = dc.champ INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles fda ON fda.id_donnee = dc.id_donnee
Query.where: WHERE dc.id_donnee =-id- AND fc.id_form =-idGrille- ORDER BY dc.id_donnee, fc.rang, dc.champ

Query.from: FROM spip_forms_donnees sfd INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs sfdc ON sfdc.id_donnee = sfd.id_donnee AND sfdc.valeur = '-critere-'
Query.where: WHERE sfd.id_form = -idForm- GROUP BY idDonnee DESC

Query.from: FROM spip_forms_donnees_champs sfd
FROM spip_forms_champs_choix
Query.where: WHERE champ ='-champ-' AND id_form =-id- ORDER BY rang

Query.from: FROM spip_forms_champs_choix
Query.where: WHERE champ ='-champ-' AND choix='-valeur-' AND id_form =-id- ORDER BY rang

Query.from: FROM spip_forms_champs_choix
Query.where: WHERE champ ='-champ-' AND choix NOT IN (-multiSelect-) AND id_form =-id- ORDER BY rang

Query.from: FROM spip_mots
FROM spip_forms_donnees_champs
FROM spip_forms_donnees_articles fda INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = fda.id_donnee AND fd.id_form = -idGrille-
FROM spip_forms_donnees
FROM spip_forms_donnees_articles
FROM spip_forms_donnees_champs
Query.where: WHERE id_donnee = -idDon- AND champ = '-champ-' AND valeur = '-choix-'

Query.from: FROM spip_articles a INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles da ON da.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = da.id_donnee INNER JOIN spip_forms f ON f.id_form = fd.id_form

Query.select: SELECT nom_site, url_site, url_syndic, descriptif idRub
Query.from: FROM spip_syndic

Query.select: SELECT champ, rang, titre, '' valeur, '' id_donnee
Query.from: FROM spip_forms_champs

Query.select: SELECT fd.id_donnee, fd.id_form, '59' FormRep, a.id_article, fdc1.valeur ref, fdc2.valeur question, '124' valdef, fdc3.valeur typecon, fdc4.valeur droit
Query.from: FROM spip_articles a INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles da ON da.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = da.id_donnee AND fd.id_form = -idForm- INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc1 ON fdc1.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc1.champ = 'ligne_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc2 ON fdc2.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc2.champ = 'texte_1' INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc3 ON fdc3.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc3.champ = 'mot_1' LEFT JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc4 ON fdc4.id_donnee = fd.id_donnee AND fdc4.champ = 'multiple_2'
FROM spip_forms_donnees_champs dc
FROM spip_mots m
FROM spip_mots m
FROM spip_articles a INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles da ON da.id_article = a.id_article
FROM spip_forms_donnees_articles
FROM spip_articles a INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles da ON da.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees fd ON fd.id_donnee = da.id_donnee
Query.where: WHERE a.id_rubrique =-id- ORDER BY a.date DESC LIMIT 0 , 1

Query.from: FROM spip_auteurs_rubriques r
FROM spip_rubriques r

FROM spip_articles a INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_articles da ON da.id_article = a.id_article INNER JOIN spip_forms_donnees_champs fdc ON fdc.id_donnee = da.id_donnee AND fdc.champ='ligne_1' AND fdc.valeur = '-critere-'
